name: Micheal Lyons
review: They BLEW the ROOF off at their last event, once everyone started figuring out they were going. This is still simply the greatest opening of an event I have EVER witnessed.

name: Gary Wong
review: Every time I see him shred I feel so motivated to get off my couch and hop on my board. He’s so talented! I wish I can ride like him one day so I can really enjoy myself!

name: Theodore Duncan
review: How can someone be so good!!! You can tell he lives for this and loves to do it every day. Every time I see him I feel instantly happy! He’s definitely my favorite ever!

name: Mattie Casarez
review: This is exactly the kind of advice I’ve been looking for! One minute you’re packing your bags, the next you’re dancing around in the streets without a care in the world.

name: Taylor Jade
review: Excellent tips! Another idea is to keep all of your important belongings like your passport inside a waterproof bag. Perfect for those last minute trips to the beach, trust me.

name: Adnan Natt
review: Who ever knew travel could be so easy? Looking forward to getting to put this into practice when I fly away in the near future. Wish me good luck!
